sentences.en: Medical paternalism comes from the Hippocratic tradition of ancient Greece.
sentences.cn: 医疗家长主义来源于古希腊的希波克拉底传统.

sentences.en: Such programs are often mistaken for corporate paternalism.
sentences.cn: 这种做法常常被误解为公司的温情主义.

words.tran_cn: 父亲的；得自父亲的；父亲般的

trans.tran_en: when people in charge of an organization or society protect the members and give them what they need but do not allow them any freedom or responsibility
